title: Largest cities in Finland 2018
summary: This statistic presents the Largest cities Finland 2018 in the Finland ( ) , ranked by the Number of inhabitants who have dined in them the 2018 141305 months , as of a survey published in 2018 .
Helsinki was among the leading brands with 648042 inhabitants .
gold: This statistic shows the ten largest cities in Finland as of December 2018 . The largest city in Finland is Helsinki with roughly 648 thousand citizens . Helsinki is the capital of Finland and is located in the south .
